auth.please_create_master_key_for_your_vault: Please create a master key for your vault.
auth.you_cant_change_this_key: You cannot change the master key once it has been created. Please choose it wisely.
auth.your_master_key_used_for: Your master key is used to encrypt and decrypt your data. Make sure to keep it safe and do not share it with anyone.
auth.your_master_key_used_for_to: Your master password is used to encrypt and decrypt your data. Make sure to keep it safe and do not share it with anyone.
auth.your_vault_is_locked: Your vault is locked. Please enter your master key to unlock it.

commons.confirm_delete_all_data: Do you really want to delete all data?
commons.confirm_delete_folder: Do you really want to delete this folder?
commons.export_pure_data: Export Pure Data (for human, high risk) .json
commons.item_on_folder_will_not_be_delete: Items on this folder will not be delete
commons.move_to_bin_confirm: Do you really want to send to the bin?
commons.remove_all_from_bin: Do you really want to delete all items from the bin?

about.zero_knowledge_desc: We do not have access to your data.

faq.backup_and_restore_a1: Recommended: Weekly with active use Before updating the application When adding important data
faq.backup_and_restore_a2: Recommended locations: External USB drive (most secure) Local computer (in an encrypted partition) Multiple copies in different locations Not recommended: public clouds, email
faq.backup_and_restore_a3: Yes! When exporting, you can set a separate backup password that differs from the master password.
faq.backup_and_restore_a4: A complete copy of all data
faq.backup_and_restore_q1: How often should I make backups?
faq.backup_and_restore_q3: Is it possible to encrypt a backup with a separate password?
faq.backup_and_restore_q4: What is included in the backup?
faq.prices_and_licenses_a1: Yes, it's completely free with no hidden fees. We believe security should be accessible to everyone.
faq.prices_and_licenses_a2: We don't make money from users.
faq.prices_and_licenses_a3: No, all features are free. Premium features for business users may be available in the future, but the basic functionality will remain free.
faq.security_end_encryption_a1: All data is stored locally on your device in encrypted form. We do not use cloud servers to store your passwords.
faq.security_end_encryption_a2: We use: AES-256-GCM / ChaCha20-Poly1305 for data encryption Argon2id to protect the master password SHA-256 for hashing All data is encrypted before being stored on the device.
faq.security_end_encryption_a3: Unfortunately, it is impossible to restore access. The master password is not stored on our servers and cannot be recovered. We follow the principle
faq.security_end_encryption_a4: Yes, biometrics (Face ID/Touch ID/fingerprint) are used only for convenient access to already decrypted data. The master key remains protected by your password.
faq.security_end_encryption_q3: What happens if I forget my master password?
faq.security_end_encryption_q4: Is it safe to use biometrics?
faq.storage_and_management_a1: There are no limits! The app is optimized to handle thousands of recordings. It all depends on the available space on your device.
faq.storage_and_management_a3: Use: Folders for categories (Work, Personal, Social Networks) Tags for quick searching Favorites for frequently used Search in all fields
faq.storage_and_management_a5: Unfortunately, access to your data is impossible without the master password. You can: Try to recover the password from a backup, create a new database (old data will be lost), or use recovery tools (if you saved the hint).
faq.storage_and_management_q1: How many passwords can be stored?
faq.storage_and_management_q2: Is it possible to store files and documents?
faq.storage_and_management_q4: Is there a history of password changes?
faq.storage_and_management_q5: I forgot my master password, what should I do?
faq.using_the_application_a2: 1. Go to Settings ‚Üí Security ‚Üí Export data 2. Select the format (we recommend .kdbx for KeePass) 3. Set a password for the backup 4. Save the file in a safe place
faq.using_the_application_a3: Synchronization is currently not supported. Each device has its own independent database. To transfer data, use the export/import function.
faq.using_the_application_a4: We deliberately opted out of cloud syncing for: Maximum security (data never leaves the device) User control (you have complete control over your data) No single point of failure (no internet dependency)
faq.using_the_application_q1: How to import passwords from other managers?
faq.using_the_application_q4: Why is there no cloud sync?

setting.note: Please note: After clearing temporary keys, you will need to sign in to your accounts again. Face ID and PIN will not work until you re-enter your primary credentials.
setting.shake_to_lock_desc: Quickly lock your safe in critical situations
